mapper.select: SELECT c.nickname, c.room_no, c.profile_img, d.content FROM ( SELECT a.nickname, a.profile_img, b.room_no FROM member a JOIN room b ON ( a.member_id = b.member_id ) WHERE b.member_id IN ( SELECT member_id FROM room WHERE room_no IN ( SELECT room_no FROM room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) AND member_id NOT IN #{memberId} ) ORDER BY b.room_no ) c JOIN ( SELECT content, room_no FROM chat WHERE msg_time IN ( SELECT MAX(msg_time) FROM chat WHERE room_no IN ( SELECT room_no FROM room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) GROUP BY room_no ) ) d ON ( c.room_no = d.room_no )
select content,member_id,room_No,to_char(msg_time,'mi')as minute,to_char(msg_time,'HH24') as hour from chat where room_no=#{roomNo} order by chat_id
